story:
UPDATE: We made our stretch goal - and its all thanks to you! We are now working hard to get the kits right to your door. Feel free to email us with any questions: info@infarm.de.

We set a new goal of €25,000 so we can give back a little extra to all our funders.  Support us and receive LIMITED EDITION seeds - a mix of several types of seeds so you can explore the whole range of microgreen colors and flavors. We will also give each of you a RECIPE BOOKLET so you can prepare enticing recipes with your home-grown microgreens!

Q&A: Many of your have asked some interesting questions about the Microgarden and seeds. We are answering all your questions right below under YOUR SUPPORT.

The indoor farming movement has begun. No longer is the idea of growing fresh produce in your home a futuristic concept. Based in the heart of Berlin, INFARM is a farming incubator that aims to provide urban communities with the freedom to grow fresh, local, organic produce, no matter the season, right at home.

Activities:
  • An indoor farm growing non-GMO, chemical-free herbs, vegetables and microgreens
  • Lectures, workshops and experiments that demonstrate how indoor farming can provide cost-effective and eco-friendly nutrition for all
  • Microgarden - a kit for growing microgreens at home
  • A farm-to-table supper club featuring produce from the indoor farm
  • Customized indoor growing systems designed to suit varied needs

"A truly avant-garde design that is bringing us closer to a better future."
Werner Aisslinger, Studio Aisslinger


Microgarden

INFARM has partnered with Stockholm design group, Tomorrow Machine, to develop a never-before-seen microgreen growing kit. This innovative, playful kit is the first step in growing your own food. The kit comes with all you need to start growing microgreens, complete with:
  • A PP foldable green-house (completely recyclable!)
  • Agar agar powder to create a gel-based growing medium 
  • 3 varieties of organic seeds - peppery rucola, crunchy mustard and spicy radish
  • Instructions

  1. Inspired by the ancient art of origami, the kit folds into a mini-greenhouse.
  2. It is made from a transparent waterproof material that allows one to watch the entire growing process.
  3. The seeds are spread over seaweed based agar agar gel
  4. It takes 3 days in the dark for the seeds to sprout
  5. Another week in the light and the microgreens are ready to eat without watering even once!
  6. And the best part? You can do it over and over again.


"InFarm has a very creative and innovative approach to food sustainability on a community level."
James Griffiths, Swiss-based sustainability expert


INFARM Online

The first of its kind, this platform is a place that brings together all the knowledge and resources needed to grow food indoors. We want to share with you our research and experience to get you farming.

This interactive platform will feature:
News
  • Blog
  • Lifestyle articles
  • Chef/restaurant profiles
Community
  • Meet INFARMers around the globe online
  • Share experiences, recipes etc.
Projects
  • Updates on current projects
  • Think-tank for new ideas
Marketplace
  • Seed exchange
  • Buying/selling of tools and equipment
Facts
  • Scientific research and articles
  • Video tutorials

Your Support

€0 - €15,000

INFARM Microgarden

Our first goal is to raise €15,000 ($20,000). We will use your money to pay for the conception, production and delivery of the Microgarden to share the joy of farming with you!

€15,000 +

INFARM Online
All additional funding will be dedicated to the development of our online platform to cover expenses of programmers and designers, testing, hosting, content developement, etc.

Q&A

We answer your most frequently asked questions here:
Q: Can I continue to buy seeds from INFARM?
A: Yes, you will be able to purchase a variety of seeds from our website INFARM Online, or we will connect you with local suppliers. We can also send you additional agar agar powder packets.

Q: Are the seeds organic?
A: Yes! 100% organic bought from trusted suppliers.

Q: Can we use the kit again?
A: You can use the kit over and over again. You simply have to replace the agar agar and seeds!

Q: Can you grow other things in the kit?
A: To get best results we recommend you sticking to the seeds.

Q: What is the kit made of? 
A: The material used for the Microgarden is PP (polypropylene), which is a recycled plastic material - 100% safe and reusable.

About Microgreens

Microgreens are a tiny form of young edible greens produced from various kinds of vegetables. Microgreens are distinguished from sprouts, which are younger and grown in the dark.

The average crop-time for most microgreens is 7-14 days from seeding to harvest. Microgreens offer the highest concentration of vitamins and nutrients, up to 40 times more than mature plants.They have intense flavor and aroma and taste like the fully grown plants.


Workshops, Lectures & Experiments

We believe it is important to share information. Over the years we have gained a wealth of knowledge and experience which we want to share with our community. At the INFARM warehouse, we are hosting weekly workshops touching on relevant topics such as:

  • Transforming Passive Consumers to Active Producers - Why and how we must decentralize the food systems
  • Soil less Cultivation - A detailed look into hydroponic designs
  • Flavor, Color, Nutrition - How growing your own can mean better products and better meals

Eventually, the content developed for workshops will be translated into INFARM Online, allowing access to this information for all.

During the campaign, we will be hosting a series of workshops in our Berlin warehouse. Check our Facebook page for updates: www.facebook.com/infarm.


Indoor Growing Systems

Be the first to own a customized indoor growing system designed to suit your varied needs. We will consult, design and implement the system tailored to the location you choose (home, office, restaurant, hotel etc.) which are designed to fit seamlessly in with existing interior design/architecture. 

To ensure best results, we will provide technical support and training on how to maintain the system.

INFARM's customized growing system made for 25hours Hotel Berlin

Every growing system will include:
  • Growing chamber for 40-50 plants (a variety of herbs, salad, roots)
  • Precision irrigation
  • Special Valoya LED-Growing Lights
  • Ventilation
  • Seeds
  • Growing medium
  • Organic nutrition


The Urban Farming (R)evolution

TODAY: Our food travels about 1500 kilometers, goes through 28 different pairs of hands and wastes incredible amounts of valuable energy before it lands on our plate.

TOMORROW: A network of INFarmers growing their own food, exchanging fruits, vegetables and seeds.

Additional Information

Timeline

3 May - 13 June: Campaign
13 June - 30 September: Kit production

30 September - 30 October: Delivery
13 June - 31 December: INFARM Online development + launch
We will post updates on the production and development of the kits and the online platform through our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/infarm.de) and our website (www.infarm.de)

Health & Safety

Please follow the instructions carefully for best results.

Shipping & Delivery

We will start delivering your INFARM Microgarden from 30 September. Please be sure to inform us of your delivery address. We will keep you updated about the shipping status by email.

* We ship the kits to all locations. However, due to restrictions on exporting seeds, we are working with local seed suppliers worldwide to ensure you receive a full kit.

Additional Kits

If you are interested in purchasing additional kits, please contact us on info@infarm.de.

Contact Us

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us on: info@infarm.de
Twitter: @INFARMBerlin

Find us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/infarm.

If you are in Berlin, come visit us!
Glogauer Str. 6, 10999 Berlin, Germany, 9:00 - 15:00 Mo - Fr


Thank-you!

Special thanks to Anna and Hanna from Tomorrow Machine, Merav Maroody for the beautiful photos, Asaf Sagiv for composing the epic music, Christoph Hoffmann for his advice and support.

We also want to thank all our friends and family for their continued help:

Nikko, Joe, Charlie, Adi, Jan, Nick, John, Amanda, Bruno, Francesca, Sean & Tasty Pictures, Noam, Maria, Antoine, Ophelié, Sebastian, Lo, Erik, Ariel, Florian, Ilan, Diego, Jana, Simon, Wiebke, Thorsten, Sylvester, Damian, Werner, Matze, Marco.

Thank you from the INFARMers - Erez, Adi, Osnat and Guy.

Glogauer Str. 6, 10999 Berlin, Germany, 9:00 - 15:00 Mo - FrThank-you!Special thanks to Anna and Hanna from Tomorrow Machine, Merav Maroody for the beautiful photos, Asaf Sagiv for composing the epic music, Christoph Hoffmann for his advice and support.We also want to thank all our friends and family for their continued help:Nikko, Joe, Charlie, Adi, Jan, Nick, John, Amanda, Bruno, Francesca, Sean & Tasty Pictures, Noam, Maria, Antoine, Ophelié, Sebastian, Lo, Erik, Ariel, Florian, Ilan, Diego, Jana, Simon, Wiebke, Thorsten, Sylvester, Damian, Werner, Matze, Marco.



Thank you from the INFARMers - Erez, Adi, Osnat and Guy.

story:
Tragic Accident

On 5/22/2014 on the I-15 freeway in Murrieta, C.A a beautiful young single mother of 3 lost her life in a tragic car accident while on her way home from work around 5 a.m.

Link to report in the paper: http://murrieta.patch.com/groups/police-and-fire/p/motorist-crashes-into-overturned-big-rig-dies-in-i15-crash-in-murrieta

Why we need YOU!

These three children have been left with no provider, and an uphill battle has now begun. Their lives have stacked the odds against them but we are here to make sure that they stay on the straight and narrow. With all of your and our support we can raise the funds necessary to put them through college and to get them there in the first place! Please help!

The Impact

Alexandra Dundas, Charles Bidinger, and Yvonne Bidinger have lost their one and only mother and provider. The power is in your hands to assure they do not fall through the cracks. Every person makes a difference.

The mom that gave her all

Irene was the mother you hear stories about in inspirational books and newspaper articles. She gave her all working night and day to provide for these little angles, her little angles. But she is not here anymore, her efforts were not in vain. We all saw the dedication she put into her children's lives and into her community. Let's repay her by helping these kids who have just lost so much. Let's make sure her hard work and dedication was not in vain and help.

Thank you, God bless you, may he watch over these children now more then ever.

Feel free to contact us with any questions you may have!

Proposed allocation of funds raised:
1. Funeral cost's:                        $8,000-10,000
2. Caregiver support:               $2,000-Any amount surpassing college goals.
                                                         (Set up to be dispersed over time, and monitored
                                                         for proper use of funds)
3. College fund:                          $20,000 x 4 years x 3 children = $240,000

Total funds necessary:            $250,000-est$300,000

story:
Since launching in 2007, the Lexus Enthusiast website has become the single best independent source for daily news and insider information on all things Lexus.

This fall, the site will be going through a large scale redesign that will introduce important & frequently requested new features – it’s an ambitious goal with plenty of challenges, and we will need your help to make it a reality.

Community Forum

The single biggest change will be a new community forum — It’s time for enthusiasts from around the world to have a central place where we can discuss Lexus news and events while sharing our knowledge with other owners.

This forum will be the heart of our community, moderated by well-respected and passionate enthusiasts, and built on a modern discussion platform that rewards participation.

Active members will be recognized for their contributions through a reward system, and the regional sub-sections will encourage local meets around the world.

World’s First Lexus Podcast

Readers have also been asking for more meaningful access to Lexus executives and decision makers – that’s why Lexus Enthusiast will be launching the world’s first dedicated Lexus podcast.

Every month, editor Kevin Watts will release a new audio interview with the movers and shakers in the Lexus world, full of answers to questions that you ask.

Exclusive Merchandise

Lexus Enthusiast has been given permission by Lexus International to produce limited-edition merchandise available exclusively to site members.

A new t-shirt design will be released every three months, and additional merchandise is currently in the planning stages.

Daily Photo Project

Lexus Enthusiast will be launching the Daily Photo project, a new section of the website focusing exclusively on Lexus photography.

Images will be sourced from photographers, reader submissions, official sources, and the extensive archives of Lexus Enthusiast.

Founding Membership

In order to fund development of these new features, Lexus Enthusiast needs a group of 100 founding members.

For your early pledge of $100, you will receive a lifetime premium membership with unlimited access to:

  • The world’s first Lexus podcast
  • Exclusive member forums & posting privileges
  • Limited edition Lexus Enthusiast merchandise
  • Daily photo downloads
  • Monthly contests
  • Reduced advertising
  • Early access to new premium features

You will also receive recognition in a special Founding Members section, a custom forum badge marking your special status, and this limited edition Lexus LFA t-shirt:

This t-shirt is an Indiegogo exclusive and will be never printed again. As a founding member, you will be able to vote on the final color combination.

(When the site launches in the fall, a premium membership will be $30 a year.)

story:
Who we are:

We are the Chamberlain family: Bruce, Kathy, Caitlin and Nathan. We started Stone Fox Farm Creamery in 2009 as a family project when Bruce retired with 35 years for the State of Maine. Bruce, who has always had a passion for eating ice cream, decided to take a course to learn how make ice cream at the renowned Ice Cream University in West Orange, NJ. We continue to attend trade seminars to increase our knowledge of making the best ice cream possible. We also pride ourselves on using the very best locally produced Maine ingredients in our ice cream, including local Jersey milk and cream, fresh berries, pure maple syrup, apples, pumpkins, and other all natural flavorings and extracts. The care and quality ingredients we put in our product makes for a truly outstanding ice cream!


Stone Fox Farm Creamery is growing!

Thanks to our loyal customers who can't get enough of our ice cream, the MobileCone truck is in high demand! Because MobileCone can't be in two (or three! or four!) places at once, we are looking to acquire another mobile unit to bring our ice cream to even more people. With two trucks we can cover more of central and mid-coast Maine (and beyond!) Our ice cream is handcrafted using the best, natural ingredients, including local milk and cream, ensuring extremely delicious, flavorful ice cream you can feel good about eating.

Our Story

We started making ice cream in 2009 on our small farm in Monroe, Maine.  Originally intended to be a part-time, summer-only, retirement project. We quickly exceeded our expectations. Business has been steady thanks to our customers all over Maine and we are now making ice cream year round. We are currently in about 30 locations and counting. In 2013, we initiated a major expansion of our production space, which allowed us to keep up with the demands from retail stores. We soon found, however, that we were having to turn down events requiring our ice cream truck, having to disappoint people who wished to have our ice cream at their wedding, fair, or festival.By supporting our second MobileCone you will be helping to bring our incredible ice cream to new customers.  We will also be able to create new employment opportunities in our rural corner of Waldo County by  hiring more people to keep up with demand and to staff the new truck.

This Indiegogo Project will enable us to share our delicious ice cream with more of Maine and New England and spread some SFFC swag and treats around at the same time. Have you ever wanted to invent your own custom flavor? Get a lesson in ice cream making? Host an ice cream party for 100 of your closest friends? Here's your chance.

Read on to discover the swag and treats we have as rewards for our generous sponsors. 

The Impact

We started our business five years ago. We have gone through the hard part of building a processing plant, tackling all of the licensing issues associated with making and vending ice cream. After getting our first MobileCone up and running (outfitted, inspected and licensed by the State), the second one should be much easier. We expect to have the project up and running by the end of April 2014 allowing us to bring our ice cream to happy customers and enabling us to hire more people.

You can also help us in other ways

We would be very happy if you could give us an amount that is affordable to you, using the IndieGoGo service. If, however, this is not possible for you, then please tell your friends about Stone Fox Farm Creamery by sharing our campaign on Facebook,  by email or word or mouth with your friends and family. 

Visit us on our social channels (Facebook, Youtube, website). And also use the IndieGoGo share tools! Have questions or ideas? Please feel free to contact us.

Thank you.

story:
About Little D’s Baby Carriers

My husband and I founded Little D’s in February 2012. Our baby carriers are affordable, completely unique and beautifully hand crafted.

Our line of carriers includes a signature series that features humorous phrases that celebrate the babywearing movement and a baby anatomy collection that features artistic images that display the correct carrying position for baby a stretchy wrap.

We sell our carriers at local baby, trade and craft shows.  Our carriers are also available at a handful of local retailers.  Our monthly sales have allowed us to cover our start-up costs and expenses, and now we are looking for funding that will allow our expansion with an international distributor.

It is really important to us that our carriers continue to be made by real, hard-working people in North America. Many of our competitors have their products made in other countries where labor is less expensive than Canada and the United states, but we don't want to take jobs out of the economy, we want to make jobs. 

We want to turn Little D's baby carriers into a full-time business that will allow us to increase our production volume from hundreds of carriers a month to thousands.  We hope that our brand will become synonymous with babywearing all over the world and that one day people will consider Little D's stretchy wrap baby carriers an essential product for every new parent.    

Help us to turn Little D’s Baby Carriers into an international brand so that we can offer our carriers to more families, help to promote babywearing around the world, contribute to a stable North American economy, and build a stable financial future for our own little D. 

We take pride in our product and support all forms of safe babywearing.  You can learn more about our products at our online store, www.littleds.ca.

What is the baby wearing movement?

Baby wearing is the act of putting your baby in a carrier on your body, like a garment. This allows parents to go on with their daily tasks while being assured of their baby's security and continue responding to her needs.

Being carried offers a baby movement, pleasure, warmth, security and sounds that are similar to those of the womb. The movements of the mother and the sound of her heart stimulate the baby's nervous system.

A wrap style carrier is comfortable for the parents, because it adequately distributes the weight across the shoulders, back and hips. There are no bands that dig into the skin. All this allows parents to carry babies for longer periods without tiring.

Wearing your baby is fun. Wraps attract attention, initiate conversations and encourage communication. And there's nothing like the feeling of having your baby cuddled up to you.

Little D’s believes that babywearing is an unstoppable movement that every family should be able to participate in.

How you can join the Little D's babywearing movement


We have already have $10,000 of our own money to put towards our expansion.  Our goal is to raise an additional $10,000 to expand and grow our business.  This money would be used towards the following:

  • a 500 square foot studio space to work in
  • new cutting table and fabric cutting equipment to make our wraps more efficiently
  • a stand alone vinyl solvent printer and cutting device

Help fund our movement and celebrate with these awesome babywearing perks!

For a contribution of $1 or more, you will receive a virtual cuddle.  Yes, that's right!

 

For a contribution of $10 or more, you will receive a babywearing sticker.  These stickers have been designed by Little D’s in celebration of the babywearing movement and are only available from us.  They can be applied to any clean surface, indoors or outdoors – and are commonly placed on the rear window of the family vehicle.                                                                                                         

In addition to our babywearing sticker, for a contribution of $50 or more you will receive a babywearing onesie for your little-one.  The Onesies are also designed by Little D’s in celebration of the babywearing movement and are only available from us.  All onesies will be white in colour, gender neutral and have the phrase "born to be worn"pressed onto the front in soft, velvety flocked vinyl. They are made from 100% cotton and will fit babies between the ages of 6-12 months.  

                                      

For a contribution of $100 of more you will receive a babywearing sticker, a babywearing onesie AND a stunning sterling silver cuff bangle engraved with a babywearing phrase.  These bracelets will be hand-made from genuine sterling silver, will fit a woman's wrist, and are only available to contributors to this campaign.

    

 For a contribution of greater than $250 you will receive a custom Little D’s stretchy wrap baby carrier made from eco-friendly 70% Bamboo and 30% Cotton jersey.  Learn more about our eco-friendly fabric here.  Our carriers are one size fits all.  Every carrier comes with written and pictorial instructions.  Our carriers make an excellent gift for an expecting mother.  Send us your graphic or textography, and we'll make it happen!  You could put your business logo, your baby's name, or even your favorite song lyrics ... the sky is the limit!

If we do not reach our goal, we will use every dollar towards as much expansion as we can, and you will still receive your perks.  

Other Ways You Can Join our movement:

Be Social!

  Like us on facebook and share our campaign with your  friends

  Follow us on Twitter and re-tweet our campaign to your followers

  Follow us on Pinterest and re-pin our products on one of your boards

 

Buy our stuff!

Next time you are in the market for a baby carrier or are looking for a gift for a new parent, go to our online store at www.littleds.ca and purchase one of our products.

If you own a retail store or distribution chain for baby products, consider including our product line.  You can contact us at info@littleds.ca for wholesale and distribution inquiries.

 

Still not convinced?  Here are more reasons for you to join our movement and help us to celebrate:

Babywearing contributes to happier, healthier and smarter babies

Wearing your baby for 3 hours per day reduces crying significantly - 43% less overall and 54% less during evening hours. Carrying helps you and your baby to communicate better. Parents that carry their babies interpret the signals of their babies more efficiently, and carried babies get quickly used to facial expressions and voice of the adult carrying them. A study at Columbia University compared the levels of attachment of babies carried in a baby carrier vs. babies carried in a car seat. Results indicated that, at 13 months old, babies who were carried in wearable carriers were significantly more likely to demonstrate a strong and secure attachment to their mothers. Thus, carried children cry less because their needs are met immediately, which reinforces attachment and a sense of self-confidence in parents, who know that they have a sure way of satisfying their baby.

Studies have shown that baby wearing is linked to lowering the incidence of SIDS (sudden infant death syndrome) and behavioural disorders. Close physical contact between parent and child stimulates neurobiological connections in newborns. Babies gain weight faster, have better motor skills, coordination, increased muscle tone, and sense of balance. Carrying, especially in a tightly-held vertical position, aids baby's digestion. When babies start wanting to sit, the wrap allows them to do so, keeping their legs spread in a natural angle. Thus, their legs are not forced to be kept straight while their hips are still forming.

Babies pushed in strollers or lugged around in car seats only get to see the adult world at knee level. Carried babies get a better view of the world by allowing babies to be at face level with adults and their activities. This reassures children and allows them to harmoniously learn about their environment.

Carried babies are very sociable and calm because they are physically closer to people and intimately involved in their caregiver's environment. According to Dr. Sears, "baby becomes aware of, and learns from, all the subtle facial expressions, body language, voice inflections and tones, breathing patterns and emotions of the caregiver." Babies are exposed to the all the aspects of being human through their caregiver, increasing social development.

Babies in a content and safe environment are able to be more alert and aware of their surroundings, providing the perfect environment for learning. This also provides the parent with an opportunity for increased interaction and bonding time with their baby. Carried babies are able to learn language more quickly since they are positioned at voice and eye level. They become more involved in conversations and begin to learn how to listen.

Less expensive baby, happier and healthier family

Wrap carriers cost less than strollers, commercial baby carriers or soft-shelled carriers, and they can be used just about every day for 2-3 years. Bringing your little one along for the ride saves you the cost of childcare.

Baby wearing is convenient - nothing is more awkward than carrying a heavy plastic car seat with one arm. Baby wearing allows you to safely move about with your baby regardless of terrain - you can stroll down uneven sidewalks, narrow lanes, walk up stairs, or climb mountains. Carrying baby enables the caregiver to have both hands free. Caregivers have the freedom to care for other children while carrying their baby close (Sears). A father who participates in baby wearing can actually soothe a fussy baby. Fathers can hold babies close and talk, hum or sing which is calming to babies.

Lactating mothers will lose less bone mass by carrying with them the extra weight of their baby, thus increasing physical fitness. Prolactin and oxytocin levels in the mother are increased through contact with baby, which leads to easier breastfeeding, more responsible mothering and a more secure maternal bond. Additionally these hormones inhibit the negative impact of stress on the mother.

Help us to change the world by creating a new generation of confident, healthy, & smart babywearing families!

Close physical contact between parent and child stimulates neurobiological connections in newborns. Babies gain weight faster, have better motor skills, coordination, increased muscle tone, and sense of balance. Carrying, especially in a tightly-held vertical position, aids baby's digestion. When babies start wanting to sit, the wrap allows them to do so, keeping their legs spread in a natural angle. Thus, their legs are not forced to be kept straight while their hips are still forming.
Babies pushed in strollers or lugged around in car seats only get to see the adult world at knee level. Carried babies get a better view of the world by allowing babies to be at face level with adults and their activities. This reassures children and allows them to harmoniously learn about their environment.
Carried babies are very sociable and calm because they are physically closer to people and intimately involved in their caregiver's environment. According to Dr. Sears, "baby becomes aware of, and learns from, all the subtle facial expressions, body language, voice inflections and tones, breathing patterns and emotions of the caregiver." Babies are exposed to the all the aspects of being human through their caregiver, increasing social development.
Babies in a content and safe environment are able to be more alert and aware of their surroundings, providing the perfect environment for learning. This also provides the parent with an opportunity for increased interaction and bonding time with their baby. Carried babies are able to learn language more quickly since they are positioned at voice and eye level. They become more involved in conversations and begin to learn how to listen.
Less expensive baby, happier and healthier family
Wrap carriers cost less than strollers, commercial baby carriers or soft-shelled carriers, and they can be used just about every day for 2-3 years. Bringing your little one along for the ride saves you the cost of childcare.
Baby wearing is convenient - nothing is more awkward than carrying a heavy plastic car seat with one arm. Baby wearing allows you to safely move about with your baby regardless of terrain - you can stroll down uneven sidewalks, narrow lanes, walk up stairs, or climb mountains. Carrying baby enables the caregiver to have both hands free. Caregivers have the freedom to care for other children while carrying their baby close (Sears). A father who participates in baby wearing can actually soothe a fussy baby. Fathers can hold babies close and talk, hum or sing which is calming to babies.
Lactating mothers will lose less bone mass by carrying with them the extra weight of their baby, thus increasing physical fitness. Prolactin and oxytocin levels in the mother are increased through contact with baby, which leads to easier breastfeeding, more responsible mothering and a more secure maternal bond. Additionally these hormones inhibit the negative impact of stress on the mother.
Help us to change the world by creating a new generation of confident, healthy, & smart babywearing families!

story:
Who we are and what we do

My brother Daniele (on the right) and me, Andrea (on the left), founded girometti.it in order to create, manage and promote e-shops. We wolud like to cater to small businesses from our region (Abruzzo, Italy) that do not have enough resources, skills and expertise, by providing a full service.

Daniele graduated in Economics and Finance at the University of Chieti, and began his career as sales agent. Along with his passion for computers and programming, he eveloped solutions for e-commerce, B2B initially. In girometti.it Daniele deals with the design and implementation of e-shop and the operational management of the virtual store. Also Daniel is active in research and development of new solutions for electronic business.

I graduated in Economics at the University of Chieti. At the end of 2011, I launched the project girometti.it. My duties concern strategic and administrative aspects of the firm and I support partners in the analysis of the e-commerce projects.

 

The Idea

We do not want to simply sell websites, but we want to give an opportunity to all those small businesses who want to open a window to the World for their products.

The basic idea is to offer to our potential clients a complete service for free or at a price as low as possible and then share revenues coming from online sales.

The goal is to achieve an optimal combination of e-shops and sales per store, in order to achieve efficiency in terms of costs for shipping and packaging and in term of bank charges.

Advantages would be potentially reciprocal: small business would have an opportunity for free, girometti.it could have the opportunity to select the best companies to be included in its network. 

 

What We Need and What you get

We need to USD 10,000 to purchase hardware and develop software. But above all, we need to promote our idea  to our potential customers. We need to meet personally small business owners in order to show properly benefits coming from this collaboration.

 

Partnering with girometti.it will get you the following:

  • At the $ 10 level: the satisfaction that someone somewhere is thinking of you with gratitude and appreciation
  • At the $ 100 level: our gratitude and we will include your name in our website as main sponsor of our business. We will also give you special coupons for products of our future network 
  • At the $ 500 level: in addition to the above things, a bottle of red wine of the famous Montepulciano d'Abruzzo 
  • At the $ 1000 level: in addition to the above things, three bottles of famous Montepulciano d'Abruzzo. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Click on our website www.girometti.it. Leave comments and advices, report errors. 
 
Visit websites of our coming clients and buy their products, if you like. Share your experience with your friends. 
 
Finally, if you like, visit my village, Ortona, and my region Abruzzo.
 
Thanks!

story: 'leelee's forest' is a brand new woman's dress boutique opening up in Pier 17 of the South Street Seaport in Manhattan, NY. The new rustic, indie boutique is essentially mirroring into leelee's closet featuring unique pieces in an earthy and raw space. Ryan and Leigh Ann would love your support in this time of them opening up their first business together. We are very excited about this pop-up store and to see how it grows! We will be using every dime that we receive as working capital and for increasing our inventory. Every penny counts! If it's not possible for you to contribute, you can still help! Help us spread the word! Let's make some noise about this campaign! We are sending so much love and gratitude for anyone that can push us forward. Thank you for your support everyone!

story:
Stump Speech.

Fellowship Church exists to connect and lead people into a growing relationship with Jesus Christ.  We will do this by being generous with our resources beyond the walls of our church facilities, so that we can turn our communities into family.

We are a movement, not shackled to tradition or institution.  We will be known for being the church in our local communities and not just a church that people attend. Being a church that is focused on reaching the community will allow us to serve 100's and 1000's of people who would otherwise never be reached with the life changing message of Jesus.

Fellowship Is On The Move.

We believe that moving our facilities to a well known, highly visible, easily accessible, and central location, like Showcase North; will bring positive change to our church, our communities, and ultimately the people that we are trying to reach.  

The Impact

We believe that this will be a move that will bring positive change to our church, our community, and ultimately the people that we are trying to reach.

  • Our destination is Showcase North, a local movie theater.
  • We will be ideally placed in between Holden, North Worcester, and West Boylston, and we will also right off of Interstate 190.
  • Showcase North has upscale and comfortable facilities that are ideal for our purposes.

What We Need.

So here's the deal:

To make this dream a reality, We need to raise $60,000 in 60 days.  These funds will go to cover moving expenses, new equipment (sound board, speakers, cables, lighting, etc), marketing (signage, mailers, t-shirts, name tags, etc.), a storage/transport vehicle, and to make a dent in our first year of rent.  This will require a lot of prayer and some major steps of faith.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to do more, this section is for you.  Here are a few ways you can help.

Share our campaign on your facebook news feed or on Twitter.

Like our Facebook page and/or follow us on Twitter.

Join us for a Sunday Morning Service at our current location, and bring your friends, neighbors, family members, state representatives, veterinarian, the kid that cuts your grass, the person that bags your groceries, the pharmacist, your high school sweetheart, the dry cleaning lady, and your hairdresser, and the mailman!

story:
We're going to stimulate the collection of used waste oil ...and you can help!


The Company

Geneco International is a seed-level initiative composed of three individuals passionate about new technology that can help people and the environment.

Our team is working hard, and smart, to broadcast exciting new technology expected to eradicate waste oil problems and achieve a greater energy independence for people.  We need your support to get this going!

The Technology

A combination of components apply innovative engineering, including advancements in filtration technology, to purify waste oil for use as a fuel replacement for any engine that uses diesel.


Learn more at http://geneco.me/

The Team

  • Norman 'Sam' Campbell
  • Anthony Fogleman
  • Our anonymous inventor
  • Carola Campbell

With offices in Somerset England and North Carolina USA

The Vision

The founders vision the use of technology to benefit all creatures (including humans) in terms of healthy environments, energy independence, and opportunity.

The favorable environmental impact of the technology is believed more readily appreciated in the developing world presenting economic incentive to act responsibly through efficiency in energy production. The environment everywhere will benefit as a result of better waste oil collection practices and less transportation of waste products.

The logical application for the GenePak is with systems that supply cities, towns and villages with electrical or kinetic energy. Diesel power plants make up a substantial portion of the of the energy mix in every country, as most utilities have diesel backup to supply the need when demand peaks.

Stimulating collection and efficient use of waste oil globally is our vision.

We at Geneco International clearly see how GenePak makes this possible.  Can you share our vision?

The Goal of this project

In Africa, the "hungry continent", food crops are under pressure to be used for  production of biodiesel because the continent is in need of energy and food.  It could be said that any fuel ultimately replaced by waste oil represents food that will feed a hungry African mouth.  From this point of view, the goal is to feed people.

That we may have the biggest impact, the team wants to employ the Genepak in communities that don't have easy access to waste oil recycling plants, or as they're also known, re-refineries.

The team has a base already in Tangier, Morocco, and believe the country offers a favorable climate for project initiation and assembly.

The Geneco Road Show

The team has been planning the show that will evidence the technology to community leaders and energy companies the potential for big savings on energy generation, and a natural entry to the "green" community.

We look forward to getting this technology out, proving that even the dirtiest waste oil can be used for fuel -- and, as independent studies have indicated, will outperform diesel fuel for emissions and efficiency.

With our mobile show, we intend to convince utility directors and community leaders that the technology is viable with clear evidence -- a generator on our trailer running waste oil, complete with flow meters, and an operational GenePak in plain view.

Stimulate collection of waste oil in Africa

Some of the money will buy a used tanker truck to collect waste oil where it is needed to service the first 10 or so kits, where needed.

Assembling kits in Morocco puts the distribution source inside the continent, in keeping with "the goal". When we've succeeded in Morocco, we expect word to get out to other communities across Africa as we make our rounds to where we're needed most.

What We Need & What You Get

We'll rig-up in UK, drive through France and Spain to Morocco trailering our diesel generator with an SUV.  The small tanker truck will also make the trip.  Because of certain restrictions with how waste oil is used, applying it to transportation has certain issues in certain countries, such as the UK, otherwise, we'd be driving there on waste oil too!

A bold new approach is being taken to see if we can bring awareness to the technology that will result in a cleaner environment in ways that can't esily be measured.  The project will empower users with low-cost fuel for generating energy either to supplement a power grid during peak times or to power small villages' schools, hospitals, community centers and homes.

  • There's no way to predict how much money we'll eventually need to make the difference we're talking about - so there's no such thing as too much. Getting this project started is the next step. We suspect that initial success will lead to proliferation of the technology to communities worldwide.
  • We're documenting Geneco Africa so you can see for yourself how your money is being spent.  We'll post videos and testimonials as well as put out a weekly newsletter whenever possible to chart our progress.
  • If we don't reach our target, we'll use the funds to assist in the sales of the next ten GenePak kits to make it affordable for customers. 
  • Newly-installed units will improve our credibility through proof-of-concept, and we'll monitor each customer so we can build a reference base to measure performance and to chart the difference the GenePak is making in communities.

The goal of $42,974 is what we believe is the minimum we need to pull off this project as we see it, but a lot of people are going to get excited about this, so we think they'll help us reach our goals in Africa with a high degree of certainty.  That's why our practical goal is $70,758.  

The high amount of $105,788 represents our hopes for support from you that will give us the wind under our wings to do this with a wide margin of success, and let us do things like subsidize the cost of new generators in African villages needy for the opportunity that energy brings.

The Impact of Contributions

Every dollar contributed to this campaign will be spent to bring this new technology to Africa -- and the world.  Together we can give people a new use for waste oil.

  • Installing the GenePak has a positive effect in any community when you consider that waste oil needs to be transported.  Each location with a GenePak represents a viable drop point for waste oil -- with a looser set of restrictions that re-refineries typically impose on collectors.
  • The Geneco Int'l Team will take accurate measurements to be used as benchmarks, record images, video, and different facts we learn along the way.
  • With a little support, we trust this project will lead the way to a new business that doesn't concern itself with being the ONLY provider of this technology, but certainly one who will make its name in the oil recycling industry, and earn big points in the green community.

Got Cash?  Please contribute...

Short on cash? You can still help!

If you like the idea of helping a fledgling company off the ground to benefit the environment and communities in Africa and the world, help us out by sharing this page by using the share tools in this Indiegogo campaign to tell others in your network.


THANK YOU FOR SHARING!

 -- THE GENECO TEAM

The Geneco Int'l Team will take accurate measurements to be used as benchmarks, record images, video, and different facts we learn along the way.
With a little support, we trust this project will lead the way to a new business that doesn't concern itself with being the ONLY provider of this technology, but certainly one who will make its name in the oil recycling industry, and earn big points in the green community.

Got Cash?  Please contribute...
Short on cash? You can still help!
If you like the idea of helping a fledgling company off the ground to benefit the environment and communities in Africa and the world, help us out by sharing this page by using the share tools in this Indiegogo campaign to tell others in your network.




THANK YOU FOR SHARING!
 -- THE GENECO TEAM

story:
For parents in New York, keeping kids active and entertained is always a challenge, especially during the winter months. While there are plenty of outdoor activities for high-energy kids during the summer, we feel that local businesses providing indoor activities are sorely lacking.

 

Burnout Brooklyn is a proposed 20,000 square foot indoor multi-activity play space to be situated in the popular neighborhood of Redhook, Brooklyn. Catering to children from birth to 12 years of age, our play center will include a state of the art adventure playground complex, slides, ball pits, a toddler and baby area, a 20' indoor rock wall, a video arcade and cafeteria and an indoor skateboard park.

 

We're fortunate to have a very experienced backer for the project. Our business partners, House of Play from the UK have over 20 years experience designing and building play centers for independent operators all over the world. Using their expertise and business know-how, and with 'Astrabound' their very popular 14,000 sq foot showcase facility in England as a model, we aim to make Burnout Brooklyn the premiere indoor play space for young families in Brooklyn and Manhattan.

This is Astrabound:

http://www.astrabound.com

We've also been approached by 'The Fun Factory' (also in the UK) who have agreed to act as consultants in the project:

http://www.funfactoryrochford.co.uk/take-the-tour/

 

 

We are currently in discussions with several property owners in Redhook. Developers are very interested in viable projects that will add value to the neighborhood, encourage visitors to the area and add much-needed services to the community. But housing a business like Burnout Brooklyn will require substantial development. Property owners will only invest capital in the project if we can prove it is financially viable and has substantial community support.

 

So the goal of this campaign is twofold: 

1. to raise seed capital to pay the professional fees we need to develop our plans for the facility

2. to show property owners, developers and investors how much community interest there is in a business like Burnout Brooklyn.

Our business plan and cash-flow forecast already show that Burnout Brooklyn will rapidly become a very profitable venture. Feedback from advisors and prospective Venture Capital investors has been very positive. But to move our plans to the next level, we need funds.

Our total estimated startup costs for the play center are around $1,300,000. But given the intricacies of New York City planning permission and regulations, we're not going to be in a position to begin construction for at least another year. But we already have expenses to pay and it's not been easy getting this far. We need the services of designers, researchers, lawyers and business consultants.

 

We've set a modest goal of $40,000 for our seed capital, which will allow us to develop our plans for the next 12 months and secure investment for the construction.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family. Whether you post a link on Facebook or Twitter, or send an email to your community, wed love for you to help us spread the word. 
  • Click onto our comments tab to give us feedback!
  • Professionals can contribute a product or service to be offered as a perk to our contributors. Contact admin@burnoutbrooklyn.com for more information

 

We believe this project will become an enormous asset to the community. Please help us to reach our goal!

Professionals can contribute a product or service to be offered as a perk to our contributors. Contact admin@burnoutbrooklyn.com for more information

 
We believe this project will become an enormous asset to the community. Please help us to reach our goal!

story:
About Orain

Orain was created out of frustration by a group of individuals who found that, within the "wiki farm" community, the only options were:

  • Fee based hosting and/or
  • Ad based hosting.
  • Restrictions on what you could do with your farm.
  • Little ability to custom configure your community

We decided to change that and took it one step further by being open source as well. We allow (and encourage) our community to help us build, maintain, and change our infrastructure. Our entire configuration is available for the public to see, use (or copy), and even improve. 

We love being community based and led - and we don't want to see that change. Since starting in 2013, our farms have grown to nearly 300, and our userbase is triple that. 

So, what's the big deal?

We've outgrown our current home, and the cost to move is going to be expensive. Currently, we're paying roughly $65-$80 a month for our hosting services. That cost is going to double as we move to accommodate our current community and the amount of traffic that our communities receive. The money we raise is going to help us: 
  • Temporarily move our home to larger servers as we investigate the possibilities of purchasing our own servers.
  • Develop and create new widgets, applications, and extensions to increase the end-user experience.
  • Work on further expanding our abilities and target audience.

It's going to be a bumpy ride...

... and we know that! When we created Orain - we figured it'd just be a small (yet vibrant) community and it would be easy to handle the traffic. It's been anything but that. We're about transparency, and we know that it's going to be a long road ahead. By facing our challenges today we can help ensure our longevity and improve our services tenfold. We're actively creating our long term plans and are excited to improve and expand our services while remaining open, community based, and ad free. Some of our long term plans include

  • Purchasing our own servers thus decreasing our overhead cost
  • Reaching out and offering to host smaller wikis who are facing challenges with independent hosting or are with hosts who are for-profit or ad based
  • Working on a solution to automate the wiki creation process

Other Ways You Can Help

We don't just need funds to ensure that our community is supported, you can also help by

  • Getting the word out and sharing this campaign with your friends
  • Donating your time by volunteering with Orain. We're constantly looking for an extra set of hands. 
  • Sharing information with us. If you know of something that might help Orain - we want to know! Find a staffer online and let us know. 

Questions?

We know this box doesn't cover everything. If you're curious about something or simply want us to clarify something - please reach out to us. We're more than willing to answer or clarify a question. Email staff(at)orain.org and we'll get back to you quicker than you can refresh your inbox!

story:
Short Summary

We have found the perfect land to establish our first Center for Training in Mystical Traditions, Healing, and Retreat.  

Contribute to our project, and as such contribute to increasing the empowerment of wisdom and awareness in the world towards a golden age of peace and prosperity...!  

Anyone who has spent time around a good Community, Ashram, Retreat etc. has seen how the sacred place facilitates Healing, Empowerment, and Experiences of Realization in the people who come there.  The receivers of such then carry these gifts through resonance into their lives, families, communities, and our world. Thus the establishment of such centers is causing improvement in the quality of life for the general human community through empowering individuals and families.

Other Goals Include:

-To have regular ongoing anna dhaanam  (offering free meals to serve and facilitate Dharma/Service to harmony of the whole).


-Regular puja or ceremonies placing focus on and generating Energy - Frequency - Vibrations - and Resonance of Higher Consciousness - Super-Intelligence.

   
-Provide ongoing space for retreat and immersion in regular practice in ideal environment.


-Provide space for retreat for recovery, healing, and re-empowerment with training in techniques for self care, healing, and mastery.  Also retreat with series of Siddha Energy Medicine Sessions, and Energetics Mastery Training...

More Details on the Project for the Land at the Bottom of Article...

What We Need & What You Get

$40,000 - to purchase Land 1.5 acres, up against a "green belt" (which means it's zoned as it is, no one can build behind us on this "green belt") with a creek running through.

$14,000 - for first simple building/dwelling, which can be used while we build the larger building projects, for guests, community areas, ceremonial area, temples, gardens, greenhouse, etc. any funds in excess of our goal can also be used towards this end.

If we don't reach our goal, the funds raised will be used towards the payoff of the part of the land we are able to purchase under contract agreement with the owner to pay off over the next 2 years.

We have a list of Great Perks Available...

With the success of our goal facilitated by your contribution today, there is a beautiful center for you to come and retreat from whatever the stories or activities of your daily world may be.  A place to restore balance and return to the center within, from where all power, wisdom, inspiration, and energy arises.  By choosing to contribute now you also are instrumental in offering the same to "who knows" how many others...

Beyond the material, often those that contribute are ones who realize that selfless offering and service to the whole is a fundamental value, lasting wealth, and one of the essential treasures which Life has to offer.  So in other words, in giving one "receives" immensely more than is being given, because the merits of generosity are far more reaching than material.  

 

     

    The Impact

    It is impossible to measure or put a rational limit on the profound impact on each life of the individuals who visit such a center as this that we are creating.  Then as each individual receives new light, inspiration, sharpened awareness, wisdom, increased capability to function in harmony and empowered ways, etc. they then carry this with them onward into their lives continuing spread this same light and empowerment like a chain reaction.

    • These kinds of acts are the foundation of Humanity, and the Treasure of Being Here Now!
    • Even without having previously established our own center to work out of, those who know us, are well aware of the blessings that radiate from our simple devotion to Truth, and lifestyle in practice of the Teachings of Perfected Masters.  
    • We are always grateful to have such feedback and to hear from many how the light that we share has been an incredible inspiration and powerful positive force in their lives.
    • To be able to establish a center for people to come, and to perpetuate ongoing healing, empowering, and enlightened activities will be a blessing to our lives, others lives, and the world in ways we cannot even limit with imagination.
    • Your Choice to Contribute Now will effect positive change in countless lives...
    • Each sacred space like we are creating, is another empowerment through this spreading light for a Golden Age of Peace, Harmony, and Prosperity! 

    Risks & Challenges

    If we fall short of our goal we may only be able to get a piece of the land we are aiming for.  There are three lots we would like to purchase together, two of them we can pay off over time because we have worked out a deal with the seller directly to allow us to pay off the two lots over the next 2 years.  The third lot has a real estate agent involved, who says the seller is only interested in selling the property for a cash offer. 

    • If we fall short of our goal we can at least get the 2 lots.  It is better if we can raise the money to pay for these two lots sooner as well, because if we do pay partially on the land and then default we would be in danger of losing the land.
    • We will set up an agreement/contract for the land with extra space or comfort and which is easy to meet the requirements of and remain in honor to the agreement.  Then we will raise enough money to pay the land of early, and begin building asap!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please Share with as many People as Possible!

    - You can send us donation as a prayer to the Divinity of your choice asking for support and success of our project, or send reiki or other energy in meditation visualizing the energy manifesting all support and all means for material actualization of our vision and project...

    -Even making a choice to contribute $1 today is of immense value and helps our cause!  This helps keep our page on indigogo active so that it appears higher in the general listings on indiegogo, rather than pages deep...



    More Details about our Temple - Center Vision and Project:

    Shrines for Form - Murti of Chandi-Durgaa as form of all Gods and Goddesses in One symbol and form embodying activated Shakti - Energy of the Sum Total of Everything.  Other smaller murtis may follow and be included in the part of the temple/shrine for Form -such as Ganapati, Maha Avatar Babaji, Dattatreya, Shiva Linga, Muruga, Shirdi Sai Baba and others.

    Sample images of Murti's for Durge and Dattatreya:

                         

                             Durge                                                               Dattatreya


    Also to include in our temple project is a shrine room for Formless Essence of Divinity represented by a Light - symbolizing the Light of Consciousness as Formless Essence and Medium by which all perception and form is known-witnessed.

    A shrine will also be included which may be incorporated with the room containing the Light, where the symbol of Altar will be a Mirror.  The mirror is a traditional central focus of ancient Shinto Tradition from Japan which is a preserved branch of the Ancient Siddha Tradition with many of the same teachings.  The mirror in our temple is to symbolize the Param-Atman, the Self the medium in which all experiences - and all phenomena arise just as reflections are seen in a mirror.  This mirror then is also to remind and facilitate the recentering of Awareness within do inner experience of Divinity, for you are offering respects and focus to a mirror reflecting a self "image" back to you.

    We plan to have many places for guests to stay, such as small retreat "cutirs" or huts similar to what one might find in India.  Events will be conducted and facilitated not only by Darshan and Prema but also by other traveling Teachers, Swamis, Babas or Matajis, Saints, or Locals with valuable offerings.  We know some wonderful potential guides for these events we can arrange to come when we have the center started. 

    There will be a combination of free/donation based events and paid events depending on the nature of the event and the  normal procedures of the Guest Facilitators of the various events.

story:
My thinking is simple we all have loose change that we keep in a drawer, put into a box, leave in the car that gathers over time and collectively that could make alot of money for a worthwhile cause if everyone donated it and hopefully like me you wouldn't miss it.

So here is my idea, lets all gather up that loose change and donate it here and at the end of the campaign we vote on a charity to donate the money to or if really successful a collection of charities to donate the money too world wide or to help someone less fortunate than ourselves.

Maybe purchase childrens toys and donate to the local hospital, the possibilities are endless and it all is possible with that loose change we all have piling up.

All it takes is to count up that loose change and donate it. I will start the ball rolling by counting all of my loose change and donate it to here.

Together we could make a big difference.  It takes one idea to start something good but takes many to make it into something else.

Thank you for reading this and hopefully you will help out and see if we can collectively make a difference.

Any ideas are welcome and thank you for your support.

story:
Helping Families with Special Needs Children by Fulfilling their Transportation Needs for Any Occasion

Delicate Angels Foundation is a 501(c)(3) organization that was formed to assist families with disabled children by providing them with specialty transportation to and from their destinations.  We also facilitate fun activities for disabled children so that they too can enjoy their youth.  Our goal and our commitment is to improve the quality of life of children with disabilities, to give them a chance to participate in life. 

Mission

Our Mission at Delicate Angels Foundation is to be able to offer special needs children the same experiences that other children get to have. The things that most of us take for granted, like going to the zoo and seeing the animals, or having the cold breeze in our face from the lake while at the beach. Even being able to go and visit family or friends when they want to. Many families that have special needs children are unable to take their children to do these type of events because they don't have, or cant afford the proper transportation needed to transport their child. Our goal is to be able to purchase handicap buses (shuttle bus style) to be able to plan and transport these wonderful children and a family member to such a place or event. 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

We need to purchase or lease a handicap bus (shuttle bus style) to start our organization off.  We also need enough funds to hold our first recreational event for these beautiful children.

  Special Transportation for Special Kids 

We need to raise at least $25,000.00 in order to lease a new shuttle style handicap bus with a lift and organize our first Special Needs event.  

The Impact

Our goal is to really enhance the lives of these families and their children by alleviating the stress of not being able to find the adequate transportation necessary to transport a child that is delicate.  Some of the children have certain conditions associated with their disabilities that makes it very difficult for their parents or guardians to transport without the proper equipment.  This makes getting out of the house a task.  Some of these children never get to go anywhere, except school, because their parents have to rely on public transportation to get them to and from ANYWHERE.  These Delicate Angels are restricted to home life because of the difficulties associated with moving them around.

This is Kristopher, one of the Delicate Angels we will be assisting. 

(We asked Kris Where He Wanted to Go)

He said that he wanted to go to Burger King.  The reason...he had never been on the inside before.  

(We Granted His Wish)

Please Help Us By Obtaining one or more of our perks

Nifty Can CoolerTotally Fantastic T-ShirtFabulous Tote  Super Awesome Cap

MEGA Sweet Package

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute or have contributed but want to help more....PLEASE assist us by liking our Facebook page, sharing our indiegogo campaign and verbally telling people about our organization...it will be greatly appreciated!

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

 Vince and Kelly Riggi                                                                                                                    Delicate Angels Foundation
